pages.text: $(li)The Patrol is a rare, naturally-spawning group of $(l:patchouli:illagers/pillager)Pillagers$(/l) over the Overworld.$(br)$(li)Their leader, who is identified by carrying the $(l:patchouli:illagers/ominous_banner)Ominous Banner$(/l) in its back, may drop it and very rarely a $(l:patchouli:tools/charm/raid_horn)Raid Horn$(/l) on death.$(br)$(li)You can force a Patrol to spawn using the $(l:patchouli:tools/charm/raid_horn)Raid Horn$(/l) too.
